explains: v. 干涉，管闲事，干预他人之事；瞎搞，乱弄

sentences.en: Already some people are asking whether scientists have any right to meddle in such matters.
sentences.cn: 已经有些人在问科学家是否有权利去干涉此类事情。

sentences.en: He is suspicious of attempts to meddle in the internal business of others.
sentences.cn: 他对企图干涉他人内部事务的行为表示怀疑。

sentences.en: They've got their way o' thinkin' and doin' things an' a body had better not meddle.
sentences.cn: 它们有自己的想法和做事方式，人类最好不要干涉它们。
